SPEAKING
  • Usable UX Meetup — November 2016

    I gave a talk on the process of building payment solutions for Nigeria. #

  • KongaPay Developer Conference - July 2016

    My team organized a conference for developers using our platform. I gave a talk on the process of building the KongaPay product, and how to use the web payment interface and SDKs. #

  • UX Lagos Meetup — March 2016

    I was part of a panel that gave a talk on the state of design in Nigeria, user experience, design process, problem-solving and introduction for new designers. #
